title: George RR Martin adapting ’80s werewolf novella into new Cinemax series
text:
George RR Martin adapting ’80s werewolf novella into new Cinemax series 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Game of Thrones author George RR Martin is working with HBO-owned TV network Cinemax and screenwriter Kalinda Vazquez to adapt his famed wer...
